title: Elf

ng ability. Wood Elf: Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10.5m per turn. Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in Stealth.

Cantrip: Know one Cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability.

Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10.5m per turn. Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in Stealth.

Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Elf race used to feature +2 Dexterity. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Clas
